paragraph: To learn more about our lawyers, please follow the links below.

detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Representation
detailsData.content: With over three decades of experience, our firm has a proven track record of holding insurance companies accountable.

detailsData.title: Focused Exclusively on Insurance Disputes
detailsData.content: We specialize in insurance law, ensuring that our clients receive dedicated and knowledgeable representation.

detailsData.title: Exceptional Results for Policyholders
detailsData.content: We have earned a reputation for achieving outstanding results for clients treated unfairly by insurance companies.

subHeading: California Trial Lawyers Handling Every Kind Of Insurance Dispute
valueProp: Pillsbury & Coleman, LLP is a California law firm focused exclusively on representing policyholders in insurance disputes and bad faith litigation.

testimonalData.text: Pillsbury & Coleman truly make a difference in people's lives by getting outstanding results. I am forever grateful for their help.
testimonalData.author: Mehran Imanabadi

testimonalData.text: As part of an in-house legal team, I look for smart, capable and no-nonsense outside counsel to guide me on critical issues. Pillsbury & Coleman's attorneys proved to be all of the above.
testimonalData.author: Bill Friedman

testimonalData.text: I can't thank Pillsbury & Coleman enough for their help during the most difficult time of my life. They were always there for me.
testimonalData.author: Peter Englert
